QuestData.Title: Threat from Dojan
QuestData.Description: While you were at the ruins dusting off tablets for my father I lost five scouts to wandering mogu patrols.$b$bThese creatures apparently have little interest in peace and are about as trustworthy as the Horde.$b$bThey are too numerous and we are too weak, however.$b$bGo to the ruins west of here and cull the mogu numbers. They won't be expecting a $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Dojani Reclaimers, 8 Dojani Surveyors, and 4 Dojani Enforcers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Kang has been sharing stories with me about these mogu.$b$bApparently ages ago they ruled as emperors subjugating all free races of Pandaria and the surrounding regions. Now they are little more than hoodlums.$b$bTo see these mogu fight though, I suspect they are trying to rekindle some of their older ideals and ambitions.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $p. Another few missions like that and we might have to make you an honorary sentinel.
